column4: Hello. I recently tried installing Vista to dual boot with XP & Ubuntu. After the installation I restored GRUB, and can start Vista & Ubuntu. However, when I choose XP, I just get an error message telling me I "can't mount the selected partition". Any ideas?
I can only assume the location of XP has been changed
I've tried all diffrent possibillities, I either boot Vista, boot Ubuntu, get "no such partition" message or "can't mount partition" message
I can also mount the XP partition in Ubuntu, so it's still intact
